text: The 7th FINA World Junior Swimming Championships, are held in Budapest, Hungary at the Danube Arena from 20 to 25 August 2019. The championships are for girls aged 14–17 and boys age 15–18. ==Medal summary== ===Medal table=== ===Men=== {| |-valign="top" |50 m freestyle | || 22.13 | || 22.14 | || 22.40 |- |100 m freestyle | ||
